remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型是可枚举的因为它继承自。This type is enumerable because it inherits from . 扩展方法并类型的对象上运行。The extension methods and operate on objects of type . 类型的对象可以通过调用其中一个主要排序方法，来获取或，将返回。An object of type can be obtained by calling one of the primary sort methods, or , which return an . 并，从属的排序方法，也会返回类型的对象。 and , the subordinate sort methods, in turn also return an object of type . 此设计允许任意数量的连续调用或，其中每个调用将执行从属顺序从上一调用返回的已排序数据。This design allows for any number of consecutive calls to or , where each call performs a subordinate ordering on the sorted data returned from the previous call. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何执行的主要和次要排序的字符串数组。The following example demonstrates how to perform a primary and secondary ordering on an array of strings. 它还演示生成是可枚举。It also demonstrates that the resulting is enumerable.
